body_html: I'd be very much interested in this feature as well! My use case is similar: I am often iterating over a prototype network for ten or twenty iterations, tweaking hyperparameters and fixing bugs according to the learning curves. Of course I can - and will - delete the superfluous runs via command line from time to time, but it would be a very elegant feature if this could be done directly in the GUI.
